permafrost.tundra.server

Class ScheduleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.ScheduleHelper

  • public final class ScheduleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Integration Server scheduled tasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean exists(java.lang.String identity)
      Returns true if a scheduled task with the given ID exists.
      static boolean existsByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns true if a scheduled task exists with the given name.
      static com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String identity)
      Returns the scheduled task identified by the given ID, or null if no task for that ID exists.
      static com.wm.data.IData getByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the scheduled task identified by the given task name, or null if no task for that name exists.
      static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String identity)
      Invokes the scheduled task service with the stored scheduled task inputs immediately under the context of the invoking user.
      static boolean isRunnable(java.lang.String identity)
      Returns true if the scheduled task with the given identity is runnable on this server, that is if the scheduled task has a state of ready or running AND the task scheduler itself is running and not paused.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String filter, com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
      Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given filter condition.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String service, java.lang.String filter, com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
      Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given service, and filter condition.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String service, java.lang.String filter, com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
      Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given name, service, and filter condition.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static com.wm.data.IData get(java.lang.String identity)
                             throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the scheduled task identified by the given ID, or null if no task for that ID exists.
        Parameters:
        identity - The ID of the scheduled task to be returned.
        Returns:
        The scheduled task with the given ID, or null if no task with that ID exists.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when retrieving scheduled tasks.

      • isRunnable

        public static boolean isRunnable(java.lang.String identity)
        Returns true if the scheduled task with the given identity is runnable on this server, that is if the scheduled task has a state of ready or running AND the task scheduler itself is running and not paused.
        Parameters:
        identity - The identity of a scheduled task.
        Returns:
        True if the scheduled task is runnable on this server.

      • getByName

        public static com.wm.data.IData getByName(java.lang.String name)
                                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the scheduled task identified by the given task name, or null if no task for that name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the task to be returned.
        Returns:
        The task with the given name, or null if no task with the given name exists.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs retrieving scheduled tasks.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(java.lang.String identity)
                      throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if a scheduled task with the given ID exists.
        Parameters:
        identity - The ID of the scheduled task to check existence of.
        Returns:
        Whether a scheduled task with the given ID exists.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when retrieving the scheduled tasks.

      • existsByName

        public static boolean existsByName(java.lang.String name)
                            throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if a scheduled task exists with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the scheduled task to check existence of.
        Returns:
        Whether a scheduled task with the given name exists.
        Throws:

      • invoke

        public static com.wm.data.IData invoke(java.lang.String identity)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Invokes the scheduled task service with the stored scheduled task inputs immediately under the context of the invoking user. This method does not interact with or update the scheduled task, and instead is intended for use by support to manually invoke a scheduled task outside of its schedule when required.
        Parameters:
        identity - The ID of the scheduled task whose service is to be invoked.
        Returns:
        The output pipeline from invoking the scheduled task's service.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs.

      • list

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String filter,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given filter condition.
        Parameters:
        filter - An optional filter condition which when true will include the matching task in the returned results.
        pipeline - The pipeline used when evaluating the given filter condition.
        Returns:
        The scheduled tasks that match the given name, service, and filter condition.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when retrieving scheduled tasks or evaluating filter conditions.

      • list

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String service,
                                       java.lang.String filter,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given service, and filter condition.
        Parameters:
        service - An optional service name which filters the returned results to only tasks that execute the given service.
        filter - An optional filter condition which when true will include the matching task in the returned results.
        pipeline - The pipeline used when evaluating the given filter condition.
        Returns:
        The scheduled tasks that match the given name, service, and filter condition.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when retrieving scheduled tasks or evaluating filter conditions.

      • list

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] list(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String service,
                                       java.lang.String filter,
                                       com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns all scheduled tasks matching the given name, service, and filter condition.
        Parameters:
        name - An optional task name which filters the returned results to only tasks that have the given task name.
        service - An optional service name which filters the returned results to only tasks that execute the given service.
        filter - An optional filter condition which when true will include the matching task in the returned results.
        pipeline - The pipeline used when evaluating the given filter condition.
        Returns:
        The scheduled tasks that match the given name, service, and filter condition.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error occurs when retrieving scheduled tasks or evaluating filter conditions.
